title: FB ADS and Social Media Management
job_overview:
We’re looking for a Social Media & Marketing Manager who doesn’t just post pretty content—but knows how to connect, build, and convert.
Someone who can confidently run and optimize Facebook & Instagram ads, and who’s ready to take full ownership of our digital presence.

You'll manage the online voice of two businesses and two personal brands. You’ll be the one turning our stories, services, and vision into measurable results.

What You’ll Own:
1. Manage and grow our accounts: Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok
2. Run Meta Ads (FB & IG): from setup to scaling
3. Create scroll-stopping visuals, reels, and campaigns using Canva or CapCut
4. Write copy that speaks to real people—and makes them click, sign up, or buy
5. Build a content calendar and drive consistent engagement
6. Track metrics, test, learn, and improve
7. Work directly with the founders and shape marketing strategies that matter

You Might Be Who We're Looking For If:
1. You’ve successfully run ads and know what metrics to chase
2. You enjoy writing, designing, creating. not just scheduling
3. You’re proactive, reliable, and genuinely care about doing great work
4. You keep an eye on trends, but stay rooted in strategy
5. You want to grow—and you want the freedom to lead, create, and be trusted

Schedule & Rate:
100% Remote
Flexible time | Available daily (7 days/week)
?15,000/month (with the opportunity to go full-time based on performance)

Why You’ll Love Being Here:
You’ll work directly with passionate, supportive founders
Your ideas will be heard—and implemented
You’ll grow with purpose, not pressure
You’ll have creative freedom
You’ll make a real difference in small businesses with a big heart

To Apply:
Upload your resume and a short intro video here: Upgrade to see actual info
If you cannot see the link, please send us a message on our FB page: Go Virtual Philippines/ Elearning Academy by Go Virtual Philippines. 

We’re not just hiring a task-doer.
We’re looking for a collaborator, a thinker, a creative partner who’s excited to build something meaningful—together.

This could be more than a job.
This could be your next big step.
